name: Super Garden Lord
description:
Super Garden Lord

Oh no! There are weeds in your garden! How could this happen?

And they're undergoing mitosis every ten seconds!

Luckily you have your trusty weed whacker!

Clear your garden in this peaceful gardening simulator!

(Epilepsy warning)

Controls

WASD + Space. Mouse to aim. It might work with a controller; we didn't test it.

FAQ

Q: This runs really poorly on my computer

A: It runs really poorly on mine too

Q: How do I turn off the effects?

A: How dare you?

Q: What does this have to do with the theme?

A: At some point in the development process we really tried to turn it into a themed game. We really did try. The enemies spawn every 10 seconds, does that count?

Q: What does YOU'VE BEEN WEEDED mean?

A:
